00022 #include <Entree_Brute.h>
00023 #include <Process.h>
00024 #include <EntreeSortie.h>
00025 #include <sstream>
00026 
00027 using std::istringstream;
00028 
00029 Entree_Brute::Entree_Brute():
00030   Entree(), data_(0)
00031 {
00032   set_bin(1);
00033   istrstream_ = new istringstream();
00034   set_istream(istrstream_);
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 Entree_Brute::~Entree_Brute()
00039 {
00040   delete[] data_;
00041 }
00042 
00043 int Entree_Brute::set_bin(int bin)
00044 {
00045   if (bin != 1)
00046     {
00047       Cerr << "Error in Entree_Brute::set_bin(int bin) : only binary format supported. Use EChaine otherwise." << finl;
00048       Process::exit();
00049     }
00050   Entree::set_bin(bin);
00051   return bin;
00052 }
00053 
00054 void Entree_Brute::set_data(const char * data, unsigned sz)
00055 {
00056   if(data_)
00057     {
00058 // For now forbid multiple calls ... could try deleting data_
00059 // Cerr << "Entree_Brute::set_data(): Multiple calls forbidden!  " << finl;
00060 // Process::exit(-1);
00061       delete[] data_;
00062       if (istrstream_)
00063         delete istrstream_;
00064       istrstream_ = new istringstream();
00065       set_istream(istrstream_);
00066     }
00067 
00068   const std::istream& iss = get_istream();
00069   std::streambuf * sb = iss.rdbuf();
00070 
00071   data_ = new char[sz];
00072   std::copy(data, data+sz, data_);
00073   sb->pubsetbuf(data_, sz);
00074 }
